website_summaries.verdict: This warmer is equipped with a built-in misting system, so it infuses your wipes with moisture each time you close the lid.
pros: Misting system with easy-fill water reservoir automatically moistens wipes each time lid closes
Add more moisture at any time by pressing the misting button
Top warming system prevents browning, drying, or discoloration
No sponge to refill and replace
cons: Lid may not stay shut, so the top wipe can be dry and cool

customer_reviews.title: More like wipe dryer
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this when I got it 4 months ago. Now however the contraption that holds the lid closed no longer works. So it pops open every time I close it and the wipes dry out. Really wish it would just work the way it did when I first plugged it in. Waste of money. Also to note, it has a bright light at night so it also doubles as a night light. Not really an issue if you are aware of it ahead of time.
customer_reviews.author: SFcity

customer_reviews.title: I bought two for two rooms. I wouldn't purchase ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two for two rooms. I wouldn't purchase again because the lid on both pops open all the time. Also the warmer is on the lid which doesn't really work well since we have switched to cloth wipes and the power cord brick gets hot and that worries me. When I used disposables it worked fine as far as warm moist wipes. I always pushed the last wipe in before shutting it because of course if it's sticking out and the lid pops up is going to dry out. And the lid will pop up! Mine didn't at first until a couple months. I never use the mister, that water isn't warmed anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Coulter/LeBlanc

customer_reviews.title: Top Breaks
customer_reviews.text: Works well heating the wipes but the top already broke on ours. It won't stay down. It can take multiple time to get it to latch closed and now the top keeps popping open a few minutes later. The causes the next wipe to completly dry out. Very dissapointed - we have only used it two months.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth  Clark

customer_reviews.title: Good but needs Improvement
customer_reviews.text: I say good but needs Improvement because of three things one the link keeps poping up and the secondary lid is too hard to open and 3 it would be nice if you could dim the light down a little bit with a dimmer switch or turn off the light all together but otherwise than that it keeps the baby wipes nice and warm
customer_reviews.author: John Moellering

customer_reviews.title: Not neccesary, didnt really solve my problem
customer_reviews.text: Eh. Maybe I don't get the appeal of this type of product. The wipes seem to get cold by the time you get them on the person's body. The sprayer doesn't always press smoothly. This is sitting on a shelf unused, waiting for a garage sale after we tried it for a month. (As a note, I was using this on an elderly person. If you have it RIGHT on the changing table, like 2 inches from your baby it might be more effective.)
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca L

customer_reviews.title: The mist button doesn't work on mine when I close ...
customer_reviews.text: The mist button doesn't work on mine when I close the lid. I'm not sure if this is bc I purchased off Amazon? I would have to manually push the button down. I had previously purchased one from Babies-R-Us and had no problems. My old one had just fallen so many times the lid finally broke. Sadly this is still sitting upstairs and I don't care to us it. Will probably just give to goodwill.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different warmer
customer_reviews.text: This is worthless. It pops open constantly. I bought a special solution for the mister and it all evaporates because the lid won't stay shut. It doesn't heat enough to keep the wipes warm for a few seconds.
customer_reviews.author: oregon

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw - lid does not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Lid will not stay closed. It has been popping open since day 1. Dry wipes. No other critiques are necessary. Its pretty simple. It is a waste of money and does not function as designed. I suspect the positive reviews on here were written before they noticed that the lid popped open.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunate Waste
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the wipes warm if the box is full. I bought 2, one for our nursery and one for the grandparents house and the lid on both of the warmers pops open on its own and no longer stays closed. This started happening after only a few uses. The opening for the wipes too come through seems too large as well. We use Water Wipes so it might just be that the wipes are too small. Not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua D Krider

customer_reviews.title: the mister is a good feature, except that it does not *automatically* mist ...
customer_reviews.text: the mister is a good feature, except that it does not *automatically* mist the wipes, it only does so when you press the wipe top closed which really isn't enough to keep the ones on top moist, so you can manually pump it yourself as many times as you want, but too many times and your wipes a little farther down are SOAKED, enough to squeeze plenty off. The warmer could work better in my opinion also. I expected it to work better but it's enough to make diaper changes tolerable for baby so it works for now unless I have another baby I will probably shop for a different model
customer_reviews.author: Miss Erin Faye

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as an open box, when the description said that the product was perfectly good to use, for my surprise it was missing the water chamber and one part of the plugin connection. So even if i kept it... i wouldn’t be able to use it AT all... as soon as i opened it... i asked for a return and a refund.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: I love this wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: I love this wipe warmer. I wasn't convinced that anyone really needed a wipe warmer, but after having my daughter I really started to like them. We have a different wipe warmer for her, and I was always disappointed when I'd pull a warm but dry wipe. We got this warmer when our son came, and I couldn't be happier. You pull a nice wet and warm wipe every time. I would highly recommend this warmer.
customer_reviews.author: J. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Water spritz helps keep things clean
customer_reviews.text: I know some people say a wiper warmer is an unnecessary baby item, but for me this one is a must have! My daughter has sensitive skin so I always rinse off her wipes before putting them in the warmer. Then I use the sprayer to spritz even more water on before I wipe her and it seems to help with clean up (especially with a poopy diaper... the extra spritz of water seems to get her even more clean.)
customer_reviews.author: Jen Z.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful. Great idea in theory, but it’s extremely hard to open the main compartment when you’re trying to refill the wipes. I don’t mind the LED light as it helps me navigate things during a 3am feeding. However, every time I pull a wipe, the entire warmer moves and it’s difficult to even get the wipe out without taking my other hand and holding the darn thing down. Super inconvenient at 3am when your newborn has a blow out and you’re trying to clean things up while not upsetting everything you’re doing to keep him calm and sleepy. Would not recommend and definitely would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Arty

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this a higher rating. But after using it for awhile, it doesn't keep the wipes that warm and they are always drying out. Even using the mister and adding water couldn't keep up with the rate they were drying. Did I mention they weren't very warm anyways? I imaging the drying issue is related to the fit an finish issue of the lid not staying secure. One corner was constantly popping up.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Love the new improved top. It’s stays down and keeps the wipes moist and warm for my granddaughters diaper chances. So glad I took the chance and bought it.
customer_reviews.author: AnnMarie

customer_reviews.title: It was the best priced what we chose
customer_reviews.text: It was the best priced what we chose. This thing has a mind of its own.... it’s hard to get shut and won’t stay shut... I just looked at it and it’s open... lol but it works great! The water thing needs to be reprimed offen but it’s nice to have to re wet it!
customer_reviews.author: SR

customer_reviews.title: I like that it keeps the wipes warm but the lid ...
customer_reviews.text: I like that it keeps the wipes warm but the lid no longer stays closed. When I first received it I noticed the lid would pop open occasionally but after just 2 months, the lid no longer stays closed at all and I have to place something on top to keep it closed. Not worth the money I spent on it and I can't find a link to contact the company to see about returning or replacing the item. An ok product but don't think I can recommend it for the price they want.
customer_reviews.author: LHeisler

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was going to be a waste of money and I really only bought it because my sister-in-law kept telling me I had to get a wipes warmer. I figured it was easier to buy one than listen to her repeat the same suggestion again and again. Boy was I wrong. This was a great purchase! Diaper changes with cold (room temperature) wipes led to loud protests from my baby girl. With warm wipes she is so much happier. Plus, this one has a mist function so there is no need to hassle with pouring water on the wipes to keep them from drying out.
customer_reviews.author: Globalfirefly

customer_reviews.title: Loud but effective
customer_reviews.text: This quote warmer does the job of keeping the wipes warm without drying them out. The only negative is that it is super loud to open and close, and you have to really push to get it open.
customer_reviews.author: SMS

customer_reviews.title: the "moisture spritzer" thing is somewhat gimmicky - just pour an extra 1/4 cup of water over your wipes when you refill - this
customer_reviews.text: The heating comes from the top lid, and it's not that warm so if you need more than one wipe or you wait more than 3-5 seconds to use your wife, it's no longer warm and the point of this product is mute. I get the idea - to avoid drying out the whole box of wipes by heating from the bottom, but there are drawbacks to this. Mostly, we just need one wipe, and it's usually warm enough to prevent our baby from screaming... the "moisture spritzer" thing is somewhat gimmicky - just pour an extra 1/4 cup of water over your wipes when you refill - this seems to keep everything nice and wet for us.
customer_reviews.author: SF Resident

customer_reviews.title: Love it recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome, works wonderfully, nothing bad to say about this! Doesn't get too hot, keeps wipes nice and warm, makes diaper experience a good one. She is 15 months and will continue to use this until potty trained. Takes off brand refill wipes perfectly. Easy to reattach cover if baby pulls it off. Light helps me walk out of nursery! Tip: store wipe refills upside down so when you put them in the more saturated side is on top. This will prevent the last few wipes from drying out ;) I never have to add water!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It's alright.
customer_reviews.text: This doesnt really work how it should. You have to manually spray the first wipe after each use to keep it moist. It doesn't spray when the lid closes like it should.
customer_reviews.author: GinaMarie Boneta

customer_reviews.title: I initially loved this product
customer_reviews.text: I initially loved this product, but after a couple of weeks, the lid stopped working, It pops up every time you close it, and the top wipe dries out. It's very annoying. Additionally, with the top open all the time, the wipes don't stay warm, so it doesn't really work for its stated purpose - warming wipes.
customer_reviews.author: LZ

customer_reviews.title: Softness in a box
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift for any baby shower. Soft, delicate and cute as a baby.
customer_reviews.author: Lesly

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.text: It does keep the wipes warm, but the lid would not stay shut after less than two months of use. I've already received a replacement and the newer one is already starting to pop open. Most of the time when you take out a wipe, the next one doesn't come out so you then have to open the entire thing (with both hands) to access the rest of the wipes. Pointless. There is no time to be fiddling around with this when trying to clean up poop.
customer_reviews.author: Treed

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: The biggest issue I've had is some wipes dry out faster than others, and if it sits to long the wipe at the top will dry and turn yellow. Other wise it's great
customer_reviews.author: Cora

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My newborn used to fuzz and make it difficult to change with regular wipes. With the wipes being warmed, he lays still and changing diapers is a breeze. It's a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Top doesn't stay shut, wipes dry out.
customer_reviews.text: It started popping open around 4 months, within a few minutes after I closed it. Now its 8 months old and the top will not shut at all, so the wipes dry out. I'm surprised a company as large as this can put out such a bad design. You would think that such a major problem would have been testing and corrected before this product went into production. I regret buying this, and would not recommend it. Also, I recommend putting a higher quality of wipe like Huggies. Otherwise you will have lots of dry wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a friend. She hasn't said anything bad about it so I guess it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Leela

customer_reviews.title: Seller great! Item sucks!
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is horrible!! It dries out my wet wipes and only leaves the corner of the wipes wet. I at first, gave this item five stars before really trying it out. Do not purchase if you are not planning on wetting the wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Chumani

customer_reviews.title: Theres no nasty sponge for you to have to keep moistening or replacing when it dries out and cracks ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this product .. The water reservoir is fantastic . the push button for extra moisturn is great and the wipes are toasty and havent discolored . my newborn grandbaby &i thank you..
customer_reviews.author: Ellen D

customer_reviews.title: NOT worth it! Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The warmer is not effective enough. 1 second after removing a wipe from the warmer, it is cold. So it defeats the purpose of wanting warm wipes to wipe your child with. And the warmer is hard to open to reload wipes. Nice to have the mister to keep the wipes moist and prevent drying but they will be cold wipes immediately after being removed from warmer
customer_reviews.author: JENNA S.

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: The lid keeps opening on its own and dried up all my wipies. Did this numerous times and returned it. It was also very diffult to open and close it
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon

customer_reviews.title: Rubber lining ripped.
customer_reviews.text: I researched heavily on wipe warmers and this one was one of the top rated ones. At first I really liked this wipe warmer because the wipes were warm and remained moist with minimal use of the mister, however the rubber lining where the wipes pull through ripped on one side. In addition, the cover doesn't seem to shut or close seamlessly. I keep thinking it's not completely shut because there's a little gap at the front above the mist button and when I press on the top, there is a decent amount of spring action that it doesn't feel like its locked. I was really disappointed and returned it. Will be searching for a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Brad J. Leahy

customer_reviews.title: A life saver!
customer_reviews.text: My son was born in December and from the very beginning hated diaper changes. As soon as a wet cold wipe would touch his bottom he'd start screaming. As soon as i got this warmer our diaper changes became more peaceful. We've had it for less than a month so i don't know how long the lid will last but I am very happy with it so far. No problems with dry wipes either.
customer_reviews.author: RockyFan

customer_reviews.title: effective wipe warmer
customer_reviews.text: The mist does help keep the wipes wet but i noticed that the first wipe that you pull is dry but i just push it back in and just leave a little of it exposed so i can still pull the wipe without inserting my fingers in the dispenser. The water in the reservoir lasts for a while so you dont have to keep on refilling it. Also when you close the lid, make sure you hear 2 clicks so it will stay closed.
customer_reviews.author: dooks

customer_reviews.title: Now I just dip my baby wipes in very warm water and that works best.
customer_reviews.text: Very cheaply made plastic. The water leaked from the reservoir as soon as I put it in. Sealed it right back up and returned it. Not worth a dime. Now I just dip my baby wipes in very warm water and that works best.
customer_reviews.author: D. Gwyn

customer_reviews.title: Cute night light
customer_reviews.text: Wish it was warmer but has no heat control. It's easy to use and it is better than using cold wipes on baby. Good size too, not bulky like most.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Macias

customer_reviews.title: Crappy execution of idea
customer_reviews.text: Crappy execution of idea. Do not spend money. Get basic munchkin wipe warmer without mist, does a much better job.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn ny

customer_reviews.title: Terrible !!!! Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchase the end of January as a gift for my daughter and our new grandson. I also purchased one for my grandmother nursery. I can not keep the lid closed!! On mine and my dtr opted to go with a different wipe warmer. I hate it!! Wipes dry out because it will not stay closed !!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Edenfield

customer_reviews.title: I love this! We keep the water full
customer_reviews.text: I love this! We keep the water full, mist 2 or 3 times after each use and don't have any problems with them drying out. We have a good amount of turnover, so they sit for a long time. I also like not having to put a cold wipe on my boy's bum in the middle of the night!
customer_reviews.author: K. Oldakowski

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had mine for about 3 months and It worked for awhile and we really liked it. Just recently the water sprayer that keeps the wipes moist broke and won’t spray anymore. It still keeps the wipes warm so we still use it. It just doesn’t keep the wipes as moist for as long.
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Terribly engineered product! The opening is too small, and it constantly pops open
customer_reviews.author: Lily Tkeb

customer_reviews.title: ... the wipes somewhat warm so he doesn't scream so bad but the problem is the thing lid is crap ...
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars because it actually does keep the wipes somewhat warm so he doesn't scream so bad but the problem is the thing lid is crap just like everyone says and the top two wipes are dried out every single time. I'm no electrician but the transformer gets so hot heat loss = energy loss. I bed this stupid thing draws a lot of power too.
customer_reviews.author: dave

customer_reviews.title: 3 stars
customer_reviews.text: I though it would warm the wipes more and the mist didn’t work
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: It has turned out to be really nice to have
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't interested in a wipe warmer until a co-worker suggested it. It has turned out to be really nice to have. My son was born in February and night time diaper changes tended to be a little cold. Warm wipes help his to stay groggy and make it easier to put him back to sleep at night. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the lid pops open like 90% of the time which makes the wipes cold
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, my experience was similar to others who have already reviewed this product: the lid pops open like 90% of the time which makes the wipes cold. I try to shut it over and over and over but always seems to pop up. The other 10% of the time it works well: keeps the wipes warm and moist. The company needs to fix this glitch. If not, find another product. It’s a big hassle closing the lid over and over.
customer_reviews.author: K.O

customer_reviews.title: Top will not stay closed!
customer_reviews.text: I am a wildlife rehabber and I really need warm wipes for my little babies. This warmer makes me so frustrated. The lid will not stay closed. Sometimes it works, but usually I have to push several times and still it pops open.
customer_reviews.author: Joy LeBaron

customer_reviews.title: ... pack but the added water spray keeps the wipes pretty moist. My son loves this thing and does ...
customer_reviews.text: The only dry wipes were the last 2-3 from the bottle of the pack but the added water spray keeps the wipes pretty moist. My son loves this thing and does cry in the middle of the night because of a cold booty
customer_reviews.author: daniel cardenas

customer_reviews.title: A need for us!
customer_reviews.text: This warmer is great! Been using it for a month and my little guy definitely appreciates the warm wipes. I also feel like it keeps them moister than the packs they come in and I've never actually had to use the mister part! Glad we got it despite all the lists saying it's not needed -it is needed in the northeast!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Lid pops open
customer_reviews.text: Only complaint I have is the lid pops open and never stays shut.
customer_reviews.author: Ritt

customer_reviews.title: This is great. My wipes never dry out and I don't ...
customer_reviews.text: This is great. My wipes never dry out and I don't need to use the mister ever. I did notice that depending on the brand of wipe the mister might be necessary. I use seventh generation wipes which are really thick so they retain the water and don't ever dry out in this. However other thinner branded wipes dry out and you need the mister.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I used only two weeks, and then the lid every time open (
customer_reviews.author: assem

customer_reviews.title: I like the design of this much more than the previous ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the design of this much more than the previous version. It is very clean looking and I like that it comes in all white so it doesn’t clash with colors in your nursery. Unfortunately, mine became difficult to close and stay closed at about 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: 100% Chance The Lid Will Stop Closing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these and both lasted less than 4 months before the lid wouldn't stay closed. I found myself never using the misting feature anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn M.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it 2 months ago, works great, no issues. Baby loves it. Whipes do not dry up. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Warmer bums
customer_reviews.text: Does what it needs to do. Only thing I find is the wipes cool quickly so be sure to leave them in warmer until ready to wipe. Great during nighttime changes so she is not overly disturbed. I'd say not a necessity but definitely a good idea to have nearby at night.
customer_reviews.author: shawn day

customer_reviews.title: Gross
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up to use for my newborn and it was dirty as if it was used. It had brown stuff in the place that has water. The inside where you put wipes was brown as well. Gross
customer_reviews.author: Thatsme

customer_reviews.title: ... mistake but as a mother of 4 children I'm glad we have one
customer_reviews.text: Many people say the wipe warmer purchase ended up being a mistake but as a mother of 4 children I'm glad we have one, finally. Turns out babies don't like having an ice cold wipe placed on their bottom. It's startling and uncomfortable. It's a great product and I have no regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Top Doesn't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: Lid always pops open. Doesn't always stay closed. Very frustrating, I'm giving it two stars because it keeps the wipes nice and warm.
customer_reviews.author: Y_tu_mamatambien

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Sorry for this review but buyers need to know that this is a poor quality product. The wipes do not stay moist and the top does not close properly.
customer_reviews.author: Warren buyer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t close due to water sprayer
customer_reviews.text: Won’t close I have to put something heavy on top of it should have returned it but threw be box away
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Thibedeau

customer_reviews.title: Great if you have a changing station
customer_reviews.text: Might be more practical in the winter season. Seemed to dry up the wipes, even with the mist sprayer, so wipes are not as effective in cleaning up a messy bottom. Did not keep it since we do not have a designated changing station, so running to get warm wipes across the room was not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: So far so good see ppl have problems with the lid so when ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good see ppl have problems with the lid so when I got mine I was very careful opening and closing it I close it with my palm Advise don't fill it up and the wipes won't dry out great wipe warmer no problems small light and a spray mist
customer_reviews.author: samantha murphree

customer_reviews.title: Lid pops open
customer_reviews.text: Lid pops open spontaneously. At first I thought I was just leaving it open from sleep deprivation, but it's gotten worse and pops open within 30 seconds of closing the lid. Bummer because even with the spray, the wipes dry out. I wish the lid would stay closed and I would give this a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Jared Collette

customer_reviews.title: Good for a while
customer_reviews.text: Great warmer for about 3 months then the lid quit closing and staying closed. So now I have to throw out a wipe everytime I go to change diapers cause it's dried out. But in the beginning I loved it soo much. Baby also loved warm wipes!
customer_reviews.author: Mariah Wichael

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality product
customer_reviews.text: The top latch wore out after only3 months and stopped staying closed, so top wipes would dry out anyway. After about 6 months the mist spray stopped spraying water as well. Would not recommend this product if it is going to last less than 6 months.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: It keeps wipes moist as promised and it looks pretty. It has a light I can't figure out what it's for though and the surface feels quite hot so I worry a bit about that but otherwise I am pleased with this product and bought another one for downstairs.
customer_reviews.author: G. NunezTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: I like the extra spritz
customer_reviews.text: Ya the top wipe dries out but you know that happens when you get a wipe warmer. Ya know your getting one of these things because you have some extra money to spend on your baby so it's tush doesn't get cold a lost wipe here or there isn't that big of a deal. I like the extra spritz.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah G

customer_reviews.title: Lid wouldn't stay closed
customer_reviews.text: The warmer works great, but the lid never stays closed. Have tried everything to make it work, but it has been a persistent problem, so have given up now. Edited - The wipes start developing an unexplained odor, worse than the dirty diaper, I would say.
customer_reviews.author: Rajani

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver. My newborn would cry everytime because of cold wipes. I don't use normal wipes, I buy dry ones and pour water inside this container. If they ever get dry, I just pour more water. I think I could have bought the simpler one instead of this one with a spray because I never use the spray and it actually prevents the top from closing sometimes (someone here said that by taking away the spray's head piece, the top would close nicely and it's true). Anyway I was afraid of buying the simpler one and getting my wipes dry, but seriously if they get dry, just pour water and you're good to go.
customer_reviews.author: A. M.

customer_reviews.title: MY BABY LIKES IT.
customer_reviews.text: well my daughter really seemed to like it when i would wipe her before she would move but with this she seems content id recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Revelez

customer_reviews.title: I haven't placed the wipes inside as yet but I ...
customer_reviews.text: I haven't placed the wipes inside as yet but I have set it up for when baby arrives, but the lid keeps opening by itself and won't stay close!!
customer_reviews.author: Tammara

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, but good things rarely last.
customer_reviews.text: Well, I loved it at first... And my daughter loved it too! But after only 4 months of great use its stopped working. I noticed a few days ago the light was much dimmer and now it's off. Now it barely gets warm. I've kept water in it, changed the water frequently and I haven't dropped or shifted it either. I don't know why it stopped working but it's sad because it really was much more pleasant for baby.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't stay shut after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Was great when we first got it, but a few months later the lid won't stay shut and the wipes dry out because of it. I put a little toy on top of it for now. Guess after a while the plastic deforms slightly and the latch fails.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Jones

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister and brother in law (baby registry) they love it
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Trouble with lid after a while...but only used during the first few months. Good for newborns. Stopped using after baby turned a 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Rigsby

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like the new one because of the plain white which ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return the first one because it would not stay shut and mist thing did not work. Second one closes correctly but I am not 100% sure it mist the wipes as advertised. Overall I like the new one because of the plain white which goes with our nursery decor.
customer_reviews.author: amotherscreation

customer_reviews.title: I had high expectations based on the other reviews. ...
customer_reviews.text: I had high expectations based on the other reviews. As previous reviewers noted, The top wipe does dry out but it's on the section that comes out for you to pull rather than the entire wipe. I have two reasons for rating it two stars. After about a month of use: 1: the pump broke that allows you to mist the wipe. So now, water doesn't leave the chamber and the dry wipe remains dry. 2. The "window" pops open spontaneously. I currently have my diaper caddy resting on top to prevent this. For the price, I expected to have this for a while before encountering problems. Especially the window popping open.
customer_reviews.author: Halo

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not stay closed.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the first few weeks. Then after that the lid decided that it would randomly pop open. And now it will not stay closed! Worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Webster

customer_reviews.title: So so for adult size wipes
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for adult wipes. The adult size don't fit in as well as baby wipes, but it is works
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen K.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Baby loves it so hard. Doesn't dry out wipes. Perfectly warm. Makes those late night changes less dramatic.
customer_reviews.author: Micheline Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Lid will not stay closed
customer_reviews.text: This product is awful I have to close the lid every 20 Minutes , it won't stay closed .
customer_reviews.author: Nassim

customer_reviews.title: Worse lid ever
customer_reviews.text: Keeps wipes warm but the darn lid never stays closed so there always a dry wipe waiting to get pulled. Everytime we close the lid we always find it open and I mean every single time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Im having problems of closing the lid after a month ...
customer_reviews.text: Im having problems of closing the lid after a month of use.... it pop up itself sometimes, and the first wipe dries out.
customer_reviews.author: Siri

customer_reviews.title: Great product. We like it the best out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. We like it the best out of three we've had. Haven't had any problems with lid staying closed or sprayer not working as others have complained. Would definitely buy again for ourselves or as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I'd recommend to all parents of babies
customer_reviews.text: I'd recommend to all parents of babies...better than the simple wipe warmer. My son gets less chaffed because the extra moisture on the wipes makes cleaning his bottom very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: I use this wipe warmer for cloth wipes. I ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this wipe warmer for cloth wipes. I loves that it has the spray feature to keep my cloth wipes wet.
customer_reviews.author: AKell

customer_reviews.title: Great, but lid pops open
customer_reviews.text: It warms the wipes and is easy to use. The lid pretty much never stays closed so I put a folded diaper or cloth on it to keep it closed. Didn't stop me from buying one for my mom's house too.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: Beware -- Mildew in the water reservoir!
customer_reviews.text: The water reservoir gets chunky gray mildew in it after a few days so I'm worried to use the wipes after they have been sprayed for fear of transferring mildew to my little one's sensitive areas. The top pops open all the time as noted by the other reviewers. Annoying and unsafe for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this wipe warmer. It gives a spritz every time you press the top closed, keeping wiped wet
customer_reviews.author: Skeasha

customer_reviews.title: Be careful not to overfill the sprayer or it leaks ...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful not to overfill the sprayer or it leaks all over. Other than that, it works as expected. I use it with homemade flannel cloth wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: We love this warmer
customer_reviews.text: We love this warmer. It really does keep the wipes warm and it does not dry them out because of the built in spray.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Not satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't like it. Is very hard to open it, and it does not warm the wipes enough.
customer_reviews.author: mmm29

customer_reviews.title: Lid won't stay shut
customer_reviews.text: This wipe warmer was great for the first couple weeks. Kept the wipes moist (not too moist) and warm. After the first couple weeks of use, the lid won't stay shut. Defeats the purpose keeping them moist! Now we have to put a folded up blanket over the top in order to keep the lid closed. We will have to get another one to replace this one in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it! It does keep the wipes warm and ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It does keep the wipes warm and wet but I do recommend you use purified water for the spray to avoid the build up of germ in the water container.
customer_reviews.author: katherine sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Imagine all of that with your child screaming with their parts dirty!!
customer_reviews.text: Product does not work. The top cover pops open all the time, leaving the wipes dry and unusuful. Yes, there is a little spray, but it not enough to wet dry wipes, and it takes forever to wet one. Imagine all of that with your child screaming with their parts dirty!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Renata

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.text: The cover doesn’t stay shut. The light blinks intermittently. Overall, it’s a low quality product and I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhandy R.

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: A wipes warmer is kind of a waste of time...lol
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R.

product_meta.title: Munchkin Mist Wipe Warmer (Old Model)
product_meta.description: Give your baby the comfort of a warm, moist wipe for every diaper change. The Mist Wipe Warmer by Munchkin offers a revolutionary yet simple way to keep your baby wipes just right. This is the only wipe warmer with a misting system that releases moisture each time the lid is closed. No muss or fuss - simply fill the removable water reservoir with water, load your wipes, plug in the unit, and you're good to go. For additional moisture as desired, just press the misting button. And with the heating system housed in the top lid, you don't have to worry about being faced with a brown, dried-out, or cold wipe ever. No more dry wipes!
feature_bullets: Misting system with easy-fill water reservoir automatically moistens wipes each time lid closes
Add more moisture at any time by pressing the misting button
Holds up to 100 wipes of all common sizes
Top warming system prevents browning, drying, or discoloration
New and improved lid closure seals in moisture

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars469 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
